scripts.build: sass ./assets/css/style.scss:./assets/css/style.css --style=compressed --source-map && cd ./assets/js/ && terser main.js navbar.js gallery.js --compress --mangle reserved=['css'] --toplevel --source-map url='app.js.map' --output app.js
